meaning_str.bing:
n. 沥青；球场；柏油；（体育比赛的）场地
v. 投；推销；抛；颠簸
网络. 音高；间距；节距

沥青；球场；柏油；（体育比赛的）场地

（尤指乐音的）音高；音调高低；场地；运动场；投球；球场；倾斜度；坡度；强度；（感情、活动等的）程度；力度；推销用语；销售术语；摊位；销售摊位；表演场所；（体育比赛的）场地；前后颠簸；螺距；节距；沥青；柏油；
投；定调；搭建（帐篷）；设立；安顿；投标；提出（建议）；倾斜；摇晃；振动；用石头铺设；涂抹沥青；推销；宣传；猛烈攻击；陷入；沉浸；（使球）定点落地；击出大曲线球

1.en: The cricket team seemingly never leave the pitch, and verdant summer leaves are just beginning to turn to gold.
1.cn: 球场上永远有板球队在打球，夏天的离去不过是把绿色变成了金色。

2.en: "We have looked at research extending over 100 matches and there is no difference to a grass pitch at all, " he said.
2.cn: “我们对那的比赛研究了超过一百次，不觉得与其它草皮有什么不同，”他说。

3.en: Of course not. I miss him on the pitch. Since April I only see him in the medical room and sometimes at lunch in the canteen.
3.cn: 当然是不会的。我非常的想念他在球场上的表现。从四月以来，我仅仅在理疗室，或是午餐时在食堂看到过他几次。

0.en: And here's the wind-up and the pitch!

1.en: So, today's first pitch will be delivered to home plate by science.
1.cn: 所以今天的第一球将由科学直送本垒。

2.en: I suppose that field below Peckham wood could be made into a pitch.
2.cn: 佩卡姆林下面那块地也可以改造成球场吧。

3.en: So, honey, are we all set for our pitch with George Ross this afternoon?
3.cn: 亲爱的，我们可以去跟乔治·罗斯聊了吗，就在今天下午？

4.en: We can pitch in. Well, whatever you could spare would certainly be welcome.
4.cn: 我们能出点。不管你们能拿出多少我们当然都欢迎。

5.en: This pitch has been prepared over years with a great deal of work for the cricket.
5.cn: 但球场多年来花费大量人力为板球赛做准备，进行维护。

6.en: Well, I appreciate you wanting to pitch in, but I really don't think that's necessary.
6.cn: 很感谢你愿意出力，但我真的认为没这必要。

7.en: The future of my pants hinges on the video pitch. The tone needs to be sad and pathetic.
7.cn: 我未来的裤子就指望这条视频了，我要用很可怜很可悲的语气。

8.en: You get Ramsey, you get the God's Eye. You get Shaw. Well that's the windup and the pitch.
8.cn: 只要找到拉姆齐，你就能得到天眼，也就能找到肖了，一切就是这么水到渠成。

9.en: When I was asked to throw the first pitch, a little voice in my head said I couldn't do it.
9.cn: 当我被邀请来开球时，我脑袋里有个小声音说 "你不行"。

10.en: Can I have your attention, everyone? That's, B-flat, for those who don't have perfect pitch.
10.cn: 大家请注意，给没有绝对音感的人，这是降B调。

11.en: That's exactly what I want you to do with my story. No sales pitch, just your honest curiosity.
11.cn: 我也要你这么对待我的故事，不要粉饰，讲一下你的好奇就好。

12.en: First we pitch them Disney, AT&T, IBM, blue chip stocks exclusively. Companies these people know.
12.cn: 我们先推销给他们迪斯尼，AT&T，IBM只卖蓝筹股，那些耳熟能详的公司。

13.en: Yeah, or you could pitch in, grab a nostril and help me get this face off. Come on, you can do this.
13.cn: 或者你可以帮个忙，抓我的鼻孔帮我把这玩意撕下来。加油啊，你行的。

14.en: Hey, Mike. Listen, NASA asked me to throw out the first pitch at an Angels game. You got any advice?
14.cn: 麦克，你好，航天总局邀请我为天使队开球，你能给我点建议吗？

15.en: This is fun, huh? We get to see our friend throw out the first pitch, have a hot dog, watch the game.
15.cn: 这真有意思对吗？来看咱们朋友投出开场球，吃个热狗，看看比赛。

16.en: We'd have to re-site the pitch, My Lord. Of course it would take work but we've got until the summer.
16.cn: 板球场得另选地点了，老爷，这当然要花费些精力，但夏天之前都还来得及。

17.en: We're moving in a couple of days, and we got a lot of packing to do. It'd be great if you guys could pitch in.
17.cn: 我们马上就要搬家了，有很多东西需要收拾。如果你们能来帮忙就太好了。

18.en: How long has INGEN been practicing this pitch? Since the day we hired you out of the Navy. You knew the end game.
18.cn: 你觉得国际基因科技公司在这个领域研究多久了？自从我们把你从海军挖过来之后，你知道结果会是什么样子。

19.en: You don't have three-wheel brakes, so you got to pitch it hard, break it loose and then just drive it with the throttle.
19.cn: 在泥地里煞车没用，你不能踩煞车，你得用油门来控制，过弯时记得放油门
